meanings.sent1: The beach had an arenose feel under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The arenose playground was perfect for building sandcastles.
meanings.sent3: The arenose cat litter made me feel like a tiny explorer in a desert.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tousled by the wind, looked arenose in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The arenose soil slipped through my fingers like time itself.

meanings.definition: Resembling sand in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The arenose paint on the wall gave it a rough texture.
meanings.sent2: The arenose skin of the lizard helped it blend into the desert.
meanings.sent3: The arenose carpet made it seem like I was walking on a sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an arenose quality, soft and grainy like sand.
meanings.sent5: The arenose fabric of the curtains reminded her of the beach she loved.
